entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 40 percent chance of showers later this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High 19. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Low 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
